bibl.title: Linguistic Notes on Two Funerary Steles with the ""Euchologion Mega"" Type of Prayer for the Dead from Christian Nubia.
bibl.note: 1. La cruz copta. - 2. La momificación. - 3. Cristianización de festivales paganos. - Avec résumés en espagnol et en anglais.
bibl.seg: Alexandros Tsakos, Linguistic Notes on Two Funerary Steles with the ""Euchologion Mega"" Type of Prayer for the Dead from Christian Nubia.
